# Amedio Jungle
## Overview
### Amedio Region
![[Amedio Jungle (Scarlet Brotherhood).png|Amedio Region|300]]
[[Amedio Jungle (Scarlet Brotherhood).png|open outside]]

## Description
The Amedio Jungle is a large stretch of [tropical](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tropical) [rainforest](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rainforest) located in the southwestern [[Flanaess]], on the continent of [Oerik](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oerik). Lying east of the [Hellfurnaces](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Hellfurnaces&action=edit&redlink=1), the Amedio extends over 300 [leagues](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/League_(unit)) south from its northernmost point at [Jeklea Bay](https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Jeklea_Bay&action=edit&redlink=1).
